Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.directory

Class StudentDirectory

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.directory.StudentDirectory
public class StudentDirectory
extends java.lang.Object
Maintains a directory of all students enrolled at NC State. All students have a unique id.
Author:
Sarah Heckman

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    StudentDirectory()
    Creates an empty student directory.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addStudent​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String id, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String repeatPassword, int maxCredits)
    Adds a Student to the directory.
    Student getStudentById​(java.lang.String id)
    Returns the Student with the given id
    java.lang.String[][] getStudentDirectory()
    Returns all students in the directory with a column for first name, last name, and id.
    void loadStudentsFromFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
    Constructs the student directory by reading in student information from the given file.
    void newStudentDirectory()
    Creates an empty student directory.
    boolean removeStudent​(java.lang.String studentId)
    Removes the student with the given id from the list of students with the given id.

    Saves all students in the directory to a file.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentDirectory

      public StudentDirectory()
      Creates an empty student directory.

  • Method Details

    • newStudentDirectory

      public void newStudentDirectory()
      Creates an empty student directory. All students in the previous list are list unless saved by the user.

    • loadStudentsFromFile

      public void loadStudentsFromFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Constructs the student directory by reading in student information from the given file. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the file cannot be found.
      Parameters:
      fileName - file containing list of students

    • addStudent

      public boolean addStudent​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String id, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String repeatPassword, int maxCredits)
      Adds a Student to the directory. Returns true if the student is added and false if the student is unable to be added because their id matches another student's id. This method also hashes the student's password for internal storage.
      Parameters:
      firstName - student's first name
      lastName - student's last name
      id - student's id
      email - student's email
      password - student's password
      repeatPassword - student's repeated password
      maxCredits - student's max credits.
      Returns:
      true if added

    • removeStudent

      public boolean removeStudent​(java.lang.String studentId)
      Removes the student with the given id from the list of students with the given id. Returns true if the student is removed and false if the student is not in the list.
      Parameters:
      studentId - student's id
      Returns:
      true if removed

    • getStudentDirectory

      public java.lang.String[][] getStudentDirectory()
      Returns all students in the directory with a column for first name, last name, and id.
      Returns:
      String array containing students first name, last name, and id.

    • saveStudentDirectory

      public void saveStudentDirectory​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Saves all students in the directory to a file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - name of file to save students to.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the file cannot be written to

    • getStudentById

      public Student getStudentById​(java.lang.String id)
      Returns the Student with the given id
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the student to return
      Returns:
      Student with the given id or null if no Student can be found with the given id
